exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type n : nat x0 : T v : Tn n T Unable to unify "v" with "(fix mk_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (u : nat -> T) {struct n} : Tn n T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T) with | 0%nat => tt | S n0 => (u 0%nat, mk_Tn T n0 (fun n1 : nat => u (S n1))) end) T n ((fix coeff_Tn (T : Type) (n : nat) (x0 : T) {struct n} : Tn n T -> nat -> T := match n as n0 return (Tn n0 T -> nat -> T) with | 0%nat => fun (_ : unit) (_ : nat) => x0 | S n' => fun (v : T * Tn n' T) (i : nat) => match i with | 0%nat => fst v | S i0 => coeff_Tn T n' x0 (snd v) i0 end end) T n x0 v)".

original: unfold mk_Tn, coeff_Tn. destruct v as [x l]. simpl. reflexivity.
